Text: Is this the edition with the really bad, longer ending or the shortened ending?
Skynet Edition is the one with extra scenes, and the longer ending, yes.

It's the edtition with the shortened ending.

The extended special edition (which are 2 minutes longer) has the longer ending.

I was actually thinking about uploading the extended special edition, but....?

Skynet Edition has all 3 versions. 

The theatrical cut, special edition (this one - with the short ending) and the extended special edtion (with the long ending)

The ending which shows Sarah Connor as an old lady sitting on a bench in the park makes me want to slit my wrists.

I'm guessing this upload has that godforsaken ending?  Say it ain't so.

No it ain't so.

This version - The Special Edition - ends with a car driving down the highway at night with a Sarah Connor voiceover.

The Extended Special Edition - ends with Sarah Connor sitting on a bench at a park, very old, watching her family while there's a voiceover.

Hope this clears it up?! :)

@VonRicht :

My Bad. I have this on Bluray, and i thought it was Normal edition / Extended Edition / Skynet Edition.

Thanks for confirming that this is the best version out there basically ;)

I especially like your HD rips with DTS-HD / TrueHD. 
Bookmarked :)
